greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Change 0 to 00 in binary representation of n.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: f[n_] := FromDigits[Flatten[IntegerDigits[n, 2] /. {0 -> {0, 0}}], 2]; Array[f, 60] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Dec 10 2009 *)
program: a084471 x = 2 * (2 - d) * a084471 x' + d  where (x',d) = divMod x 2
xref: Cf. A088698, A175047. - _Robert G. Wilson v_, Dec 10 2009
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 27 2003
